sql.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS food_cache ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, ndb_no INTEGER, food VARCHAR(100), serving VARCHAR(100), serving_size INTEGER, calories INTEGER, protein INTEGER, fat INTEGER, carbs INTEGER, fiber INTEGER, sugars INTEGER, monounsaturated INTEGER, polyunsaturated INTEGER, transfat INTEGER, sucrose INTEGER, fructose INTEGER, lactose INTEGER, maltose INTEGER, galactose INTEGER, starch INTEGER, calcium INTEGER, magnesium INTEGER, potassium INTEGER, sodium INTEGER
